name: The Cure (CorelSoft)
description:
The Cure is a game of strategy in which it engages you in an apocalyptic world in the first person and full of challenges and fun.

The zombie virus dominates the world and its function is to destroy it with drugs, diseases, fungi and even deadly poisons.
Inject super bacteria into your patients and see the damage happen but be careful not to kill it!

Buy objects, weapons and sensors to protect yourself from zombies.

Browse the black market and buy rare items.

Use drugs to improve your skills.
